snippet: The N.A.A.C.P. responds to a column by Charles M. Blow.
abstract: Letter from Benjamin Todd Jealous, president and chief executive of NAACP, comments on Nov 10 Charles M Blow Op-Ed column about data gleaned from exit polling about presidential election.
